QuestData.Title: The Drakkari Do Not Need Water Elementals!
QuestData.Description: Intelligence reports that ever since those water elementals appeared in the Drak'Sotra Fields, a number of Drakkari shaman have come down from the upper tiers of Zul'Drak to take control of them.$B$BI cannot stress enough, $g sir : ma'am;, how dangerous that could prove. We do not want them to have water elementals at their disposal.$B$BThe commander has ordered that these Drakkari water binders are to be put to the sword. Head south when you're ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sub-Lieutenant Jax at The Argent Stand has asked you to kill 10 Drakkari Water Binders.
QuestData.CompletionText: If I may suggest, you might want to take care of a few more of those Drakkari water binders.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $g sir : ma'am;!$B$BI'll see to it that the commander is apprised of your mission results.
